course_description: Prerequisites: GH 522 or permission of instructor. This course will provide an intensive overview of qualitative data analysis including the use of MAXqda software. On completing the course, students will be able to assess the quality of a qualitative data set, define objectives for a specific analysis project, develop and implement an approach using appropriate tools of analysis (e.g., segments, codes, memos, variables), and develop descriptive and comparative accounts of project findings. In addition to lectures and conceptual discussions, the course will incorporate applied exercises using secondary data and MAXqda10 software in order to develop student skills in handling real-life textual data, implementing analysis procedures and techniques with software, and working in a team-based analysis setting.
sections: Class Nbr: 6120, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 9a-4p, Instructor: Andes/Huster, Status: Open
